alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Jackson; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 8:01PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN NATCHITOCHES...SOUTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND NORTHWESTERN WINN PARISHES THROUGH 900 PM CST... At 800 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jonesboro to 10 miles northwest of Winnfield to 8 miles southeast of Campti. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Chatham, Hodge, Goldonna, North Hodge, Dodson, East Hodge, Calvin, Eros, and Hudson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
